title: Syndra Scatter The Weak Bug
body: So as I was testing Syndra in a custom i realized her E stun did not match her passive (fully leveled up and all) But in game the stun width was correct only you could barely see the stun (it was like invisible on this skin) Don't know if this is a skin issue or balance just wanted to show you guys this :D

replies.body:
Good catch! I already fixed this for the PBE and 5.14 . We found our mistake after the patch was packaged for ship, so we didn't want to delay the patch to fix this tooltip issue. It'll be fix in 5.14! 

Thanks again for the report!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Exgeniar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lU4ibA46,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-10T03:55:22.660+0000)
>
> Good catch! I already fixed this for the PBE and 5.14 . We found our mistake after the patch was packaged for ship, so we didn't want to delay the patch to fix this tooltip issue. It'll be fix in 5.14! 
> 
> Thanks again for the report!

fix zed wq bug pls and thnx
It's fixed internally. We have been refactoring most of Zed's scripts, but it's not ready to ship yet. So soon(tm).
WOOO :3 thats awesome thanks guys!! Appreciate the help and time :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Exgeniar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lU4ibA46,comment-id=000000040000,timestamp=2015-07-12T06:21:48.205+0000)

ty god bless 

I love you<3

I wish you a long good life

could we look at some future changes for her passive as well? It would be wonderfull if syndra got different parts of her passive as she leveled up instead of waiting till level 18 to actually have a passive? Please if you could do some testing on PBE, Syndra was an all time main for me last season but frankly is lacking against many champs now, and many champs i found she counters are now difficult to fight as her. {{champion:103}}  much more difficult to fight as syndra since her buffs although she used to counter the %*$& out of her

What about her R bugs? Been there since the patch Quinn was released, and never fixed. And is there any word if there are any buffs coming?

Edit: I didn't notice you're the same guy on the PBE boards I've reported to already.
Can't you hotfix it in the 5.13a patch?
Thanks for the reply! ^-^ I'm glad you guys got this all settled!
Sort of off topic but I was wondering when syndra reaches max Q points does the passive stack on each dark sphere on her R?
Nope just on Q damage itself i believe
